akas: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (original title)
akas from release info: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (original title)

1.title: Rescue Me

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Whitney's all set for a whirlwind tour as a backup dancer, but a secret love has her rethinking everything. Ashley's packing a big surprise, Buddy and Heather are on the rocks, and Todd's fixing to stab his eternal dance partner in the back.

2.title: Ghosted

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Whitney uncovers a dark truth about the man she's fallen for, but will he fess up when confronted? Todd refuses to give Whitney her class back, but she has a big fat trick up her sleeve. Heather confronts Buddy about his change of heart.

1.title: A Fat Girl Dancing

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: After a health disorder caused her to gain more than 230 pounds, Whitney was forced to give up her one, true love: dancing. But after encouraging news from a doctor, she's determined to show the world she can still move, even at 380 pounds.

2.title: Hate Mail

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: At 380 lbs. Whitney is working hard to make her "Big Girl" dance classes a success. But as things seem to be looking up, the hateful jeers of a complete stranger deliver her a crushing blow.

3.title: The Say-Yes Philosophy

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: After saying 'no' to life for the past ten years, Whitney's new 'Say-Yes Philosophy' lands her in a plus-sized fashion show, an institution she resents as an overweight woman.

4.title: More Than a Buddy

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Since teaching dance has not led to weight loss, it's time to take things up a notch with a personal trainer. And her mom's suggestion that Buddy is "the one" has Whitney questioning everything.

5.title: Doing the Beach

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: A poor body image has prevented Whitney from going to the beach for almost 20 years. And while her insecurities have never been higher, she wants to overcome her fears with an epic return in a bold bathing suit.

6.title: A Fling Thing

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: While her parents prepare for their big wedding anniversary, Whitney entertains the idea of a fling with an old friend. But trouble brews when he shows up to the party and meets Buddy.

7.title: The Wedding Job

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: A bride hires Whitney to choreograph her destination wedding but when everything goes wrong, Whitney panics. After calling in Ashley as a reinforcement, their day turns into something completely unexpected.

8.title: The Double Blind Date

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: In effort to help Ashley find love, Whitney creates an online dating profile which ensues a tangle of lies. Buddy comes to Whitney's rescue and a proposal of marriage ensues.

9.title: Leaving the Nest

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: Whitney's dance career hits an all-time high as she prepares to lead a giant dance class. Meanwhile, she and Buddy go house hunting. But just as things are looking up, devastating news puts Whitney's future in peril.

10.title: The Skinny

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: Whitney looks back at all the big fat fabulous moments this season & shares insights into her most intimate relationships and answers viewers' provocative questions.

11.title: Bab's Knows Best

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

11.plot: The special revolves around Whitney's effort to cheer up her mom after a recent event has left her feeling blue. Both mother and daughter speak candidly about their relationship. Babs joins Whitney's dance class showing off some moves of her own.

0.title: Special Weigh-In

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

0.plot: Whitney takes a heartfelt and humorous look at never-before-seen moments from the show, special home movies from her childhood, and answers personal questions from viewers at home.

1.title: Whitney's Back!

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Whitney is back and kicking things into high gear. Since diagnosed as pre-diabetic, she heads back to the doctor to see if her lifestyle adjustments have had any impact on her health. And for the first time in years, Whitney tries to ride a bike again.

2.title: Pasta La Cista, Baby

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: With the threat of diabetes upon her, Whitney throws a goodbye party for all of her comfort foods. But watching those around her indulge makes for a difficult time.

3.title: 7th Inning Splits

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: Whitney's Big Girl Dance Class prepares for their debut performance at the Grasshoppers game, but the rain has her petrified for the girls' safety. And though Buddy and Whitney they still need to break the news to Babs and Glenn.

4.title: A Home of Her Own

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: It's finally time for Whitney to move out of her parents' house and start a new life with Buddy. Whitney and Babs have a perilous bonding experience while driving the moving truck.

5.title: Design a Date

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Whitney falls hard on a first date. Whitney and Buddy do some furniture shopping, but quickly realize they have very different tastes. Plus, Glenn shares some shocking health news.

6.title: 5K Run

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: Whitney and her dad compete in a 5K race but crossing the finish line proves to be more daunting than they ever imagined.

7.title: Aloha 30

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: Whitney invites Lennie to her 31st birthday party, but quickly realizes that introducing him to family and friends on just their second date is a huge mistake.

8.title: Little Big Girl Dance Class

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: With her performance at the National Museum of Dance upon her, Whitney is still unsure of her routine. An added surprise that day throws her for even more of a loop.

9.title: First Day on the Job

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: Whitney gets a job with the Greensboro Grasshoppers, but even the most rigorous workout routine can't prepare her for the physical challenges on the first day. Later, an unauthorized break may cost her the job.

10.title: Fighting the Scale

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: After receiving discouraging news from the scale during her weigh in, Whitney's confidence becomes rattled. And a blowup with Buddy is just enough to set her over the edge.

11.title: A Muse in the Nude

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

11.plot: Whitney models for Lennie in the nude as their relationship is just beginning to blossom. After designing a logo for No Body Shame campaign, Whitney decides to pitch a bold idea to the Grasshoppers.

12.title: Not Your Mama's Cat Show

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

12.plot: Whitney and Babs go on a road trip to to enter Henchi in a cat show. But will Whitney's sleep apnea destroy Henchi's chances of winning? Big Girl Dance Class gets invited to perform at the Summer Showcase.

13.title: No Body Shame

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

13.plot: Whitney takes a huge leap with the No Body Shame campaign by creating a groundbreaking video with the hopes of going viral. With Summer Showcase around the corner, Whitney announces which member of the Big Girl Dance Class will have a solo.

14.title: Big Girls Summer Showcase

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

14.plot: Whitney and the Big Girl Dance Class seize the chance to perform with other acclaimed dancers, but dress rehearsal shows that the women might be in over way over their heads.

15.title: Burning Love

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

15.plot: Whitney wants to impress her love interest by cooking a romantic dinner, but catching the kitchen on fire is just the beginning of her problems.

16.title: Whitney Live #NoBS

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

16.plot: Host Lisa Arch joins Whitney live at the Carolina Theater for a two-hour event featuring special guests, a Big Girl Dance Party, and Whitney as she celebrates No Body Shame by receiving a tattoo from Megan Massacre live on air.

17.title: Working at the Car Wash

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

17.plot: A Big Girl car wash hopes to solve the financial woes that threaten Whitney's trip to the National Dance Museum. Plus, Whitney bares all for a photo shoot and takes off more than imaginable.

18.title: Whitney's Ticking Clock

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

18.plot: Whitney's boss asks her to fill in as the on-field entertainment at the Grasshoppers baseball game. Glenn prepares for the worst when he learns the results from his diabetes blood work.

19.title: Big Whit's Debut

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

19.plot: Whitney's boss asks her to fill in as the on-field entertainment at the Grasshoppers baseball game. Glenn prepares for the worst when he learns the results from his diabetes blood work.

20.title: Truth or Dare

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

20.plot: Whitney realizes that the weight she's gained is limiting her from becoming the dancer she once was. A game of truth or dare becomes twisted and scandalous, especially for Buddy and Lennie.

21.title: A Dance to Remember

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

21.plot: With her performance at the National Museum of Dance upon her, Whitney is still unsure of her routine. An added surprise that day throws her for even more of a loop.

22.title: Whitney Takes on LA

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

22.plot: An unlikely turn of events has Whitney off to LA for an event to celebrate a man who became an overnight sensation when he was fat-shamed on the Internet. But when Whitney returns home, she is hit with a harsh reality regarding her health.

1.title: I Wanna Be Fat

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Whitney's excitement over her first dance-a-thon takes a dark turn when she realizes that her 370 lb. body is not as healthy as she thinks it is. Meanwhile, Whitney's not sure how to feel about the reveal of Buddy's new girlfriend.

2.title: A Brush with Death

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: After collapsing at the dance-a-thon, Whitney's rushed to the hospital. But even the E.R. doctor can't scare her into making a big change, and a trip to the snow turns disastrous when she finds herself screaming at the television crew to help her.

3.title: Speechless

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: After receiving grim news from a cardiologist regarding her collapse, Whitney must take a break from dancing. But she is blindsided when she learns that one of her fellow big girls is trying to hijack her class in her absence.

4.title: Losing at Love

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Whitney wants Lennie to move in, but her couples' game night with Heather and Buddy foreshadows a disastrous reality that she hadn't considered. High hopes of getting back into radio are crushed when Whitney bombs in an interview.

5.title: (Fat Girl) Spread Thin

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: It's one thing to throw her back out at 370 lbs., but when Whitney's only option is to ride a mobility scooter in the St. Patty's Day parade, she experiences fat-shaming like never before.

6.title: Cereal Stalker

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: Whitney hits the pool with transgender pal Mattie, only to find she's withheld something significant. When Whitney gives trainer Will excuses for her recent gym absence, she gets a lashing over her diet. Lennie goes MIA and Whitney turns to stalking him.

7.title: Fat Jokes

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: Between her parents' upcoming birthday party and Will's disapproval of her eating habits, Whitney is stressed. Then, she's blindsided at her radio job when a female comedian targets fat people. When Whitney jumps on the air, things get heated!

8.title: Flirting with Disaster

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: Whitney gets a chance to make her own dance DVD, but her reputation is at stake when her backup dancers fail her. Whitney's lack of commitment has Will fed up. Glenn threatens to get rid of Allister.

9.title: Big Fat Breakup

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: Despite the harsh setback of being fired by her trainer Will, Whitney must get her life together in time for the big ballroom competition in Charlotte. A surprising twist in her love life has everyone caught off guard - especially Lennie.

10.title: The Skinny: Part 1

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: Whitney and the entire cast dish on the highs and lows of the past season, from Whitney's real feelings about the funeral intervention to the beef between her and Caitie. Plus, Lennie and Whitney meet again for the first time since breaking up.

11.title: The Skinny: Part 2

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

11.plot: The entire cast dishes up a second helping of The Skinny! Lennie and Whitney talk for the first time since breaking up. Whitney finally confesses her true feelings about Roy and sparks fly when Whitney confronts her nemesis, comedian Kerryn Feehan.

1.title: Knocked Up?

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Newly single, blonde, and a homeowner, Whitney takes a fresh approach to the challenges faced by a 370-pound dancer. But an unfortunate fight with her new "tenant" topped with the most shocking news imaginable leads to catastrophe.

2.title: Immaculate Misconception

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Whitney settles into the grave reality of being pregnant at 370 lbs., and now she must find the courage to break the news to her child's father. But when Lennie asks for proof that the pregnancy is legit, Whitney's flabbergasted.

3.title: Baby Fat

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: Glenn has a conniption when he learns of Whitney's pregnancy, and Babs spills the beans to everyone at the worst possible moment. Kiss FM has Whitney cover Charlotte's gay pride festival, but nothing could prepare her for fat-shaming at its worst.

4.title: Judging Whitney

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Whitney's big festival performance leads to a cat fight with a rival dancer; then her world gets rocked when Lennie shows up with a new woman. Forced to get real with Roy, Whitney lays everything on the table in hopes that he returns her affections.

5.title: How Long Can Whit Go?

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Whitney attends rival Jiya's dance class, and when her skills get tested and she refuses to get low, things get nasty. Then Jiya and her Trophy Wives step onto Whitney's turf, where Whitney serves up a surprise. Roy puts Whitney on the spot - on the air.

6.title: I Kissed a Girl

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: Whitney runs into a female friend from high school who invites her horseback riding. By the time Whitney realizes she's on a romantic date, there's no turning back. Babs plans a "bombshell" of a surprise for Glenn on their wedding anniversary.

7.title: Whitney Calls in Backup

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: With the dance battle looming Whitney can't afford to mess around. But bringing in cutthroat choreographer Jenzi to help with the class' routine proves disastrous when she gives Whitney a dark ultimatum. Will poses a new challenge for Buddy.

8.title: Big Girl Dance Battle

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: It's time to battle! Whitney's Big Girls gear up for the most intense performance of their lives. The Trophy Wives come packing a secret weapon that has Whitney calling "foul" and when an injury plagues her star dancer Whitney loses her mind.

9.title: Whitney Gets a Date

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: Whitney dives back into online dating, but a new type of suitor raises ample concern. Whitney and Buddy gear up for a fitness competition, but when they arrive Will drops a bomb. Meanwhile, Whitney comes upon the scorecards from the dance battle.

10.title: Belly Up

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: Whitney attends a belly dancing class with a judge from the dance battle, but when a harmless lesson turns into a public performance with a sword, panic sets in. Online date Nathan divulges information that throws Whitney's world into a tailspin.

11.title: Big Girl in the Big Apple

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

11.plot: Whitney tags along on Todd's New York trip to attend a dance workshop with The Fitness Marshall. But when she accepts an offer to be in a music video the following day, Todd goes into an angry tirade and abandons her in Central Park.

12.title: Toe to Toe

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

12.plot: With the dance battle rematch looming, Whitney's friends attempt to repair her relationship with Todd, but an untimely injury leads to an even bigger problem. Whitney learns that Babs has been rushed to the emergency room.

13.title: Whitney Steps Up

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

13.plot: In the wake of Babs' stroke, the family struggles to hold it together. Whitney offers to help with Babs' recovery, but when she receives an unexpected offer, she must choose between her family and her dance career.

14.title: The Skinny

episode of.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life (TV Series 2015– )

14.plot: Whitney and cast look back on the most outrageous moments of the season. Whitney comes clean to Roy about her feelings, and a visit from Jiya causes temperatures to rise. When host Shaun Robinson rubs Buddy the wrong way, he storms off the set.

imdb.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life
plot: Whitney is a 30 year old struggling with weight and living at home with her parents. However, she doesn't let her weight stop her from dancing.
synopsis: After a startling diagnosis of PCOS, Whitney makes the best of her new world. Watch Whitney as she overcomes adversity and shakes off the "Haters" through dance. Whitney lives with her parents who are increasingly becoming unable to afford her extreme diet. After neighborhood pets go missing and various tags are found near her car, its up to Whitney to solve the mystery. Just in time for lunch! With love on her mind and a belly full of fast food, Whitney hits the dating scene. After a blind date goes awry, Whitney must cope with fact that she may end up alone. Whitney's mother rolls her eyes and reassures her that "love is for everyone, no matter how big they may be". Whitney is obscessed with all things Shaq and formulates a plan in which to meet him. WIll her plan succeed? Will Shaq and her find love at first "bite"? Will Whitney lose weight in time for the big date? Watch the wacky misadventures and heartfelt drama play out in this new TLC sensation
